system.description: When you plead with a member of your Circle for help with a pressing situation, roll with HEART.

miss.label: Miss
miss.value: On a miss, you are exposed and vulnerable; but if they do agree to help, treat it as if they @UUID[Compendium.urban-shadows-pbta.play-materials.Item.VF0qX2cY6dZ9eA5b]{cashed in a Debt} with you that you canâ€™t refuse.

weak-hit.label: Weak Hit
weak-hit.value: On a hit, they either agree to help or owe you a Debt, their choice.

strong-hit.label: Strong Hit
strong-hit.value:
On a hit, they either agree to help or owe you a Debt, their choice.

On a 10+, their guilt is palpable: if they decline and owe you a Debt, you take +1 ongoing against them as long as you hold that Debt.
